txt.en: Your mission is to free Bilbo Baggins from the goblins. Speak to Celeblír to set forth!
Complete 'Mission: The Further Adventures of Bilbo Baggins, Chapter 8'
08. The Further Adventures of Bilbo Baggins, Chapter 8

'I hope Bilbo is all right in the depths of Goblin-town. You have bested so many of its defenders... how many could possibly remain?'

Celeblír purses his lips.

'Now that I have said it, I regret giving voice to it. Let us move on with hopeful hearts, and pretend I never said it.'
Celeblír is west of the Last Homely House, near the Town Crier.

'The inside of Goblin-town will be crawling with goblins, [placeholder]. It is not called \qGoblin-town\q without reason, as I trust you know. You have heard Bilbo's stories of it, as have I! Are you certain you are ready to rescue our hobbit?'
Monsters in this mission will continue to join the fight until their entry-point is destroyed.
Bilbo Baggins has run afoul of the goblins of the Misty Mountains... again!
'I know you are ready, my friend, but I thought I should ask. Good fortune go with you into the caves, and fight past the goblin defenders in search of Bilbo!'
